name: Apocatastasis
description:
In Apocatastasis you play as a knight that wakes up in the dungeon. Your only goal? Save the Princess. 

Apocatastasis is a game created in only 7 days, made by me (@nullandkale) and @dillyo09. To get the game you have two choices, you can download and play the version here, or you can download the source from github and compile the project yourself.

Controls.

WASD - movement.

E - use Tome.

12345 - Equip item in slot X

Ctrl + 12345 - Sell item in slot X

B - Buy a random item for 100g

Space - Activate nearby stairs or loot
